name: Planet X (axgames)
description:
**Consider Donating to support indie developers!**

You are AX-1, an android given free will and high powered weaponry. Fly and shoot your path through Planet X!  

Five worlds to explore, containing many deadly creatures with differing attack patterns. Boss battles will challenge you. Shadow zones mix up the controls and add other surprises! 

Unlock the Machine Gun and Rocket Launcher to deal some damage or use experimental weapons. The Freeze Cannon, Shrink Ray, and Change of Heart will mix things up.

 Trophies to collect for each Boss battle. Collectables in every world to unlock secret weapon! Stat tracking to see your skills. Character Bios will expand the world of Planet X.

Get out there and show those alien beasts what your made of!

For Windows Only. Mouse strongly suggested over trackpad.

Developed by A.X. Games.
